description: Top row uses the planet three steps to the left (wrap) in order Saturn->Sun->Mercury->Moon->Venus->Jupiter->Mars.
Second row uses the planet two steps to the left (wrap) in the same order.
Third row uses the planet one step to the left (wrap).
Rows 3-4 use the planet that rules the current wall.
Row 5 uses the planet one step to the right (wrap).
Row 6 uses the planet two steps to the right (wrap).
Row 7 uses the planet three steps to the right (wrap).
